name: Assicurazioni Generali S.p.A
bossPosition: Group Communications and Public Affairs Director
goal: Generali is an independent, Italian Group, with a strong international presence. Established in 1831, it is among the world’s leading insurers and it is present in over 60 countries with total premium income exceeding €70 billion in 2016. With over 74,000 employees in the world, and 55 million clients, the Group has a leading position in Western Europe and an increasingly significant presence in the markets of Central and Eastern Europe and in Asia. In 2017 Generali Group was included among the most sustainable companies in the world by the Corporate Knights ranking.
interests: Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
